>
[Shield Sconce](/Equipment.aspx?ID=875)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 115</row>

**Price** 1 sp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This carefully balanced metal bracket can be attached to the front or top of a shield or tower shield (but not a buckler), allowing you to carry a torch without giving up your shield or holding it in your other hand. While carrying a torch in this way, you must attempt a DC 11 flat check every time you use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction; on a failure, the torch is extinguished.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
